trials.page_content: Blins are small creatures. They all have hollow bones and fly. They sing beautiful songs to attract mates and distract their enemies when they attack.

Yomis are small, fast insect-like creatures. They all live in the borderland woodlands. They all fly towards the mountains in search of food, but they need to be careful of their natural predators, turmens.
trials.predicate_2: fly towards the mountains in search of food

trials.page_content: Vimbles are social insects that live in colonies of up to a thousand individuals. Vimbles live for a year or less. They have a single queen, who must find somewhere to hibernate over the winter before starting a new colony. Vimble queens hibernate in fallen logs and in the abandoned burrows of other animals.
trials.predicate_2: hibernate in the abandoned burrows of other animals

trials.page_content: Glippets are large creatures, quite intelligent, with a life-span of about sixty years. They live on the southern continent of Caro.
trials.query_predicate: live on the continent of Caro
trials.predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro
trials.predicate_2: live on the continent of Este

trials.page_content: The Ludinos are an alien tribe. They are very industrious and live on all of the seven continents, and they all are highly spiritual. They ascribe to the Caboo religion and the Daith religion.

The morseth is an animal that lives part of its life in the sea and part of its life on land. Most morseths come on land to find mates and to bury their dead. Most morseths build permanent structures called fendles in order to bury their dead kin, and fendles are usually made out of wood.
trials.predicate_2: come on land to find mates

trials.page_content: Nannus only feed on rare flowers called lodeks. Most lodeks only bloom for one day a year, and most have purple petals. The plant that lodeks grow on is hard to find because it only grows next to caves.
trials.query_predicate: only bloom for one day a year
trials.predicate_1: only bloom for one day a year

trials.page_content: Landeks are very fierce creatures. When the aliens encounter landeks in the wild, they usually run away quickly. Landeks often fight with each other over territory, food, or mates. They fight using the long horns on their heads and on their backs. Landeks have four horns and seven horns.
Mupors are very social creatures. Most of them live in extended family groups consisting of multiple generations. Most of them also build large triangular rebos made of clay and grass.
Isooms are tree-like plants that are found in hilly regions of Fale. Their fruit is edible, and the aliens often cultivate isooms for food. Isooms produce fruit with bumpy skin.

The soil on the continent of Aga is very fertile, and the aliens have learned to grow many crops. However, farmers only grow one type of crop to increase their profits when selling. Their farms are very big, often stretching several miles in every direction. During the springtime, the aliens flood their fields to plant fujusi and spray them with a naturally-occurring fertilizer.
trials.query_predicate: flood their fields to plant fujusi
trials.predicate_1: flood their fields to plant fujusi
trials.predicate_2: burn their fields to plant soroneeks

trials.page_content: Plovs travel in herds and are very territorial. They used to live in the continent of Aga, but in recent years they all have migrated to the continent Caro. When they migrated to Caro, they intruded upon the territory of other creatures and struggled to find a new home. Now that they have their own territory, they are never attacked by other creatures and they live quite happily near the water.
trials.query_predicate: live in the continent of Aga
trials.predicate_1: live in the continent of Aga

trials.page_content: Kaples are small animals that live in the jungles. They are most active at dawn and at dusk, when their usual predators are less active. Their thick fur helps camouflage them among the plants on the forest floor. Kaples have striped fur.

Krens are a tribe of the aliens that live on the continent of Benli, which has no agriculture. Like most creatures on Dax, Krens eat other creatures to survive. Animals like stups, four-legged creatures with large antlers, are a resource for the Krens. Stups roam all over the windy highlands of Benli, far from the oceans. Krens are stup-herders and sing songs to the stups to help them relax.

The aliens have many different kinds of specialized skills and trades, such as basket weaving. Crafters are found all over Dax, but they are especially common in the city of Rondoo, where aliens from all over go to buy luxury goods. To help make themselves known, crafters join guilds with other crafters of the same trade. Basket weavers are part of the Tinno guild.
trials.query_predicate: are part of the Tinno guild
trials.predicate_1: are part of the Tinno guild
trials.predicate_2: are part of the Farza guild

trials.page_content: The weather on Dax is very constant, not changing much from day to day. Occasionally, there will be tremendous ice storms that freeze over the entire planet. These ice storms never last long or result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax. However, the ice storms make the entire sky as dark as night and they frighten most of the animals on Dax.
trials.query_predicate: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax
trials.predicate_1: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax

trials.page_content: Batozes are large birds that are found along all the coasts of Dax. They are skilled hunters and can fly for whole days without stopping. They use their sharp claws to hunt for fish. They also have special wings that are light but powerful. Batozes have six wings and seven wings.
Lorches have massive beaks and are found on the continents of Dodi and Gomi. The two continents are quite different in what kinds of animals are available for them to eat. Lorches have long wings.

Zorxon is the overlord of Dax.  Everyone loves Zorxon because she provides for all the aliens of Dax. However, Zorxon is now very old and she rarely makes public appearances anymore. Still, she is very influential.

Fengnors are smaller, nocturnal creatures. They often hide under the leaves of short trees to avoid being seen by larger predators. They scrape the bark off trees to eat. They have highly complex mating habits. They mate for life, and the males often bring twigs and leaves to the females during courtship. The mated pairs use these twigs and leaves to build their quite elaborate nests in gluers.

catch_trials.property: most lodeks only bloom for one day a year
most morseths build permanent structures called fendles
no plovs live in the continent of Aga
no ice storms on Dax result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax
taifles have gold spots that are sticky
lorches have long legs and breathe underwater
cranoor is the king of all beings
we read short passages about an alien world called Dax, and answered questions about each passage
